page.title: 03Marks & Spencers
page.content: On an interview of Lorraine Walmsley about Marks and Spencers.The store is situated in Boston 5 Market.Its named Marks and Spencer because its the name of {Simon Marks }and {Tom Spencer}.The head office is at London in Baker Street thats where all the food comes from every morning and its fresh. It gets there by refrigarated lorries, Marks & Spencers has 2 nicknames M&S and Marks and Sparks.Both men and women work there. The store opens at 9.00 and closes at 5.15. The store sells clothes,shoes,food,bedding,home furnishings and toiletries.She likes M&S because you get paid a lot of money and the staff treat you nice.
